translations: n.公务便条，备忘录；协议备忘录；建议书，报告；合同书，（法律文件细节的）摘要

phrs.translation: n. 谅解备忘录，理解备忘录；学术合作备忘录
公司章程；公司组织大纲

sentences.sentence: Perhaps even more so than with letters, memorandum should start with the statement of the purpose early in the message.
sentences.translation: 也许备忘录比书信更重要的是，备忘录应该从信息的目的开始。

sentences.sentence: When the internal message is lighthearted and relatively unimportant, humor in a memorandum can distinguish its author as a person with personality and depth.
sentences.translation: 当内部信息是轻松的、相对不重要的时候，备忘录中的幽默可以展现作者的个性和深度。

sentences.sentence: One of the documents leaked to the press was a memorandum written by the head of the security police.
sentences.translation: 透露给报界的文件中有一份是秘密警察局长写的备忘录。
